hdb.table.row

Class HarambeRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • hdb.table.row.HarambeRow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Row, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object>

    public class HarambeRow
extends java.lang.Object
implements Row
    Main implementation of interface Row for HarambeDB hdb. This row implementation stores an array of objects to store the values of each row, and the Column class stores the index of the array where its value is stored. Note that the row does not store the primary key, it just stores the values of the columns linked to that primary key. The primary key is stored in the partition using a dictionary of primary keys mapping to row objects, as it would be redundant to sore the primary key twice.

    This class is a member of the HarambeDB database framework.

    See Also:
    Row, Column, ColumnList, HarambeColumnList, Serialized Form
